overview: For this new school year, the famous Russian Institute welcomes new young and pretty students who just want one thing, to receive the best education possible. At least, that’s what their rich parents hoped when they registered their precious daughters in the internationally renowned Institute. During the presentation meeting, the Headmistress and the teachers assured these diplomats and other business owners that their offspring would receive the very best education. Between learning foreign languages and good manners, they should learn everything they need to shine during high society events.
tagline: The Russian Institute Re-Opens Its Doors For Your Pleasure
title: Russian Institute: Lesson 24 - The Hussy
